title: I can't buy RP more than once every 24 hours
body:
Before i could buy like 3 times before i had to wait 24 hours but now i can only buy once.
why ? {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
For security purposes, there is a limit to the amount of *purchase attempts* that can be made during a 24-hour period. In this situation, I recommend waiting for 24 hours before making another purchase attempt.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
